divs: sighting detailsif you are on dish network, there's a channel called dish earth (287 for me)....i have looked at it during the day lots of times, but tonight is the first time for night.....i'm seeing ufos! at first, i noticed this purple glow on the dark side of earth....then it looked like an eye.....now, i think it's a very large ship, 3\4 the size of earth, not quite cloaked. and then i saw a bright light come and stay on for a few seconds, then poof! gone! the west side is so bright with sunlight it's blinding.....actually looks like a crescent moon. the dark side is where you can see the ship. big purple circle covering the earth.....transparent....looks like the earth is an eye. where it looks like the pupil is .... is where i saw the light come\go. the red dot on the upper left is a reflection off of my phone.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Petersburg
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Purple, Not Quite Cloaked. Transparent. Above Earth's Atmosphere.
